## PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction class

A transaction that has been prepared for sending.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<T = unknown> implements PopulatedMoneypTransaction<BitcoinsPopulatedTransaction, SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<T>> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [PopulatedMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.populatedmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BitcoinsPopulatedTransaction](./lib-ethers.bitcoinspopulatedtransaction.md)<!-- -->, [SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentbitcoinsmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Returned by [PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.populatablebitcoinsmoneyp.md) functions.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction` class.
